ingredients.ingredient: 5 tablespoons pressurized canned Cheddar cheese spread

cookingTips: Use a spreading knife to apply cheese spread evenly without breaking crackers
Break pretzel sticks to 8 equal-length pieces per cracker for uniform spider legs
Assemble just before serving to keep crackers crisp
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook assemble fun, kid-friendly Halloween snacks with proper balance and appeal.
